data.text: @scottmccutcheo2 @UKCovid19Stats Thousands are reporting lies to get off work and enable a recovery cert .. that's what
@CharlesHenryC19 @UKCovid19Stats Right wingers are the only ones saying that masks don't work. What an assumption 😂😂
@CharlesHenryC19 @UKCovid19Stats No. Hospitals are catching up on missed ops. People testing positive but not in hospital for covid . The test pucks up any viral load.
@jpak1888 @UKCovid19Stats And the reply to the racist accusation?

@jon3096 @UKCovid19Stats Oh I don’t want followers, I’m just judging your utter lack of followers as a commentary on your quality of content. 🤣🤣🤣🤣 and you think you called someone out on their grammar.
@jpak1888 @UKCovid19Stats Why do you want followers? Are you insecure ?

@jon3096 @UKCovid19Stats How would a mask stop a ‘viral load’… you’re using the term ‘viral load’ incorrectly. Masks were never intended to do that, they’re intended to catch droplets of moisture from being ejected into the air that carry viral particles. Astonishing you use the term simpleton 🤣

@jpak1888 @UKCovid19Stats Why if they don't stop viral loads ?
I think I made my point quite clear you simpleton.
